2
----
text/plain
value [0-1]
  number: "2" [0-1]

{"foo":2}
----
text/plain
value [0-9]
  object [0-9]
    keyValue [1-8]
      key: "\"foo\"" [1-6]
      value [7-8]
        number: "2" [7-8]

[12,11,13]
----
text/plain
value [0-10]
  array [0-10]
    value [1-3]
      number: "12" [1-3]
    value [4-6]
      number: "11" [4-6]
    value [7-9]
      number: "13" [7-9]

{"foo":2,"bar":3,"baz":[5,6,7]}
----
text/plain
value [0-31]
  object [0-31]
    keyValue [1-8]
      key: "\"foo\"" [1-6]
      value [7-8]
        number: "2" [7-8]
    keyValue [9-16]
      key: "\"bar\"" [9-14]
      value [15-16]
        number: "3" [15-16]
    keyValue [17-30]
      key: "\"baz\"" [17-22]
      value [23-30]
        array [23-30]
          value [24-25]
            number: "5" [24-25]
          value [26-27]
            number: "6" [26-27]
          value [28-29]
            number: "7" [28-29]

"foo
----
text/plain
value: "" [0-0]

{
  "foo": [
    1,
    2,
    3
  ],
  "bar": {"baz": 5, "boop": null}
}
----
text/plain
value [0-73]
  object [0-73]
    keyValue [4-36]
      key: "\"foo\"" [4-9]
      value [11-36]
        array [11-36]
          value [17-18]
            number: "1" [17-18]
          value [24-25]
            number: "2" [24-25]
          value [31-32]
            number: "3" [31-32]
    keyValue [40-71]
      key: "\"bar\"" [40-45]
      value [47-71]
        object [47-71]
          keyValue [48-56]
            key: "\"baz\"" [48-53]
            value [55-56]
              number: "5" [55-56]
          keyValue [58-70]
            key: "\"boop\"" [58-64]
            value [66-70]
              null: "null" [66-70]
